name: ASICS Gel Nimbus 25 (Womens US 8.0)
description: ASICS Gel Nimbus 25 trainers bought from ASICS outlet 8 months back n used for jogging. Have done 300km on them but should be OK for another 400km running n indefinite walking (giving cos long runs rub my toe badly). Almost no wear on outsole. Always worn with socks, no smell n not dirty. Lost original insoles (had own orthopedics) but have replaced with Hoka insoles that fit well.

name: Microwave
description: Microwave is usable and clean but it runs on a analog dial-type timer that is spoilt. The timer will increase in time rather than decrease (inconsistently) so when using, must ensure you manually take note of the time rather than relying on the timer. Do not leave the microwave unsupervised as it can go on and on without stopping. If not suitable  for beneficiaries, please let me know, I will dispose by 1 Sept.
